body_html:
My machine updated Bazel to 0.6.0 today and now I have the problem. Reverting to 0.5.4 fixed the issue.

/CC @gunan can you comment on why updating Bazel seems to temporarily break TensorFlow and what is done to fix the issue when it breaks?

My machine updated Bazel to 0.6.0 today and now I have the problem. Reverting to 0.5.4 fixed the issue.
